description:
【主讲老师简介】

沪江ID: Graceyour

个人正在努力提升英式发音，目前在沪江主要是在零基础英语群上课，和大家分享学习英语的乐趣以及练习英语朗读发音，进行新概念领读以及英文短剧朗读。本科专业是行政管理，语言是一种兴趣爱好，希望能学得更好，给大家分享更多有趣又实用的英语知识。

【课程回顾】

更多课程直播，戳我下载CCtalk>>>和大家一起快乐学！

【本课重点】

如何利用BBC动画纠正自己的发音呢？让Grace手把手教手教你吧！本课的文本重点都给乃们列出来了哦！

Charlie and Lola 6-9

-I will not ever never eat a tomato.

-I have this little sister Lola, she is small and very funny. Sometimes Mum and Dad ask me to help give Lola her dinner. This is a hard job because Lola is a very fussy eater.

-I do not eat peas or carrots or potatoes or mushrooms or spaghetti or eggs or sausages.

-I do not eat cauliflower or cabbage or baked beans or bananas or oranges and I am not keen on apples or rice or cheese or fish fingers and I will not ever never eat a tomato!

Charlie and Lola 6-15

-My sister hates tomatoes, so I say…

-That’s lucky, cause we’re not having any of those things. We’re not going to eat any peas, or carrots, or potatoes, or mushrooms, or spaghetti, or eggs, or sausages.

-There will be no cauliflower or cabbage or baked beans or bananas or oranges. We don’t have any apples or rice or cheese or fish fingers and no tomatoes? Not ever? And certainly no tomatoes.

Charlie and Lola 6-16

-But why are these carrots there,Charlie? Carrots are for rabbits, I don’t ever eat carrots.

-One day I thought of a good trick to play on her. But Lola, I said, those are not carrots.

-They’re not carrots, they’re orange twiglets form Jupiter.

-They look like carrots to me.

-How can they be carrots? Carrots don’t grow on Jupiter.      

-That’s true. Well, as they are all the way from Jupiter. Mm, not bad.

-Don’t even think about giving me a pea. I don’t ever eat peas. Huh?

-Peas are too small and too green. But Lola, those are not peas. Of course they’re not. Those are green drops from Green Land.

-Green drops! But I don’t eat green things, goody, more for me, then. Green drops! Hooray! Green drops! Yeah! Green drops,green drops are so incredibly rare.Well, maybe I’ll just nibble one or two.

（更多内容请查看视频，跟着老师一起练习发音吧！）

想在线直播收看英文名师讲解课程？

戳我下载CCtalk>>>和大家一起学习吧！
